医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
多巴胺治疗可以减少阿尔茨海默病斑块并改善记忆力日本理化学研究所脑科学中心 (CBS) 的 Takaomi Saido 和他的团队发现了一种对抗阿尔茨海默病的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Dopamine-treatment-can-reduce-Alzheimers-plaques-and-improve-memory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Dopamine-treatment-can-reduce-Alzheimers-plaques-and-improve-memory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5cbf2df-f9b6-4790-ac06-1f1d43e72c77 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 15:39:54 -0400 Dopamine treatment can reduce Alzheimer's plaques and improve memory
小肠揭示了与 COVID-19 相关的腹泻背后的机制和潜在的治疗方法约翰·霍普金斯大学医学院的科学家们通过研究形成一种“培养皿中的迷你肠”的人类干细胞，发现了几种与 COVID-19 相关的腹泻的分子机制，并提出了控制腹泻的潜在方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Mini-intestines-uncover-mechanisms-behind-COVID-19-lated-diarrea-and-pottial-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Mini-intestines-uncover-mechanisms-behind-COVID-19-lated-diarrea-and-pottial-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c712d01-90fe-4fa0-b22e-979d277c5254 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 15:35:35 -0400 Mini intestines uncover mechanisms behind COVID-19-related diarrhea and potential treatments
野火烟雾暴露增加与手术风险增加有关目前全国有近100起山火肆虐，烧毁面积超过200万英亩。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Increasing-wildfire-smoke-exposure-linked-to-higher-surgical-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Increasing-wildfire-smoke-exposure-linked-to-higher-surgical-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44967909-2b46-40d0-934f-795e5bcd5d82 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 15:19:21 -0400 Increasing wildfire smoke exposure linked to higher surgical risks
CT 扫描可预测 2 型糖尿病风险根据今天发表在北美放射学会 (RSNA) 杂志《放射学》上的一项研究，对接受健康筛查成像的人进行 CT 扫描分析可以识别出有 2 型糖尿病风险的个体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/CT-scans-can-predict-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/CT-scans-can-predict-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0661bb46-7843-4b5b-8711-fe6a5aea746d Tue, 06 Aug 2024 15:14:00 -0400 CT scans can predict type 2 diabetes risk
AI 模型与放射科医生匹配，通过 MRI 检测具有临床意义的前列腺癌根据今天发表在北美放射学会 (RSNA) 杂志《放射学》上的一项研究，深度学习模型在通过 MRI 检测具有临床意义的前列腺癌方面的表现相当于腹部放射科医生的水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/AI-model-matches-radiists-in-detecting-clinically-significant-prostate-cancer-on-MRI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/AI-model-matches-radiists-in-detecting-clinically-significant-prostate-cancer-on-MRI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ff582d3-b15b-4f8e-8f0b-72aed3ca51db Tue, 06 Aug 2024 15:10:57 -0400 AI model matches radiologists in detecting clinically significant prostate cancer on MRI
通过死后基因检测推进 DSP 心肌病的风险分层宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。 DSP 心肌病和 plakophilin 2 均通过桥粒机制与致心律失常性右心室心肌病相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Advancing-risk-stratification-for-DSP-cardiomyopathy-with-postmortem-genic-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Advancing-risk-stratification-for-DSP-cardiomyopathy-with-postmortem-genic-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=059743db-1d32-4893-882a-4f17c6ae2a00 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 14:42:00 -0400 Advancing risk stratification for DSP cardiomyopathy with postmortem genetic testing
推动似乎对激励人们接种疫苗没有效果激励人们接种疫苗的一种流行策略是助推——这一信息旨在利用人类遵守社会规范、寻求保护亲人或社区以及偏好高有效率治疗的倾向。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Nudges-seem-to-have-no-effect-in-motivating-people-to-get-vaccinated.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Nudges-sem-to-have-no-effect-in-motivating-people-to-get-vaccinated.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebf46eb0-5b1d-4ea6-bd2a-897191942a4f Tue, 06 Aug 2024 13:58:06 -0400 Nudges seem to have no effect in motivating people to get vaccinated
调查：30% 50 多岁和 60 多岁的人为有健康问题的亲人提供护理一项新的民意调查发现，超过四分之一的 50 岁及以上的人帮助照顾至少一名有健康问题或残疾的家庭成员或朋友。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Survey-3025-of-people-in-their-50s-and-60s-provide-care-to-loved-ones-with-health-problems。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Survey-3025-of-people-in-their-50s-and-60s-provide-care-to-loved-ones-with-health-problems。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e549eca4-14eb-45ec-9fd1-95e6e16ee9e4 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 13:53:24 -0400 Survey: 30% of people in their 50s and 60s provide care to loved ones with health problems
人工智能驱动的工具增强了心脏成像的手持式超声检查手持式便携式超声波探头的大小与宽大的窗户橡皮扫帚一样，可以窥视您的心脏内部 - 但这项令人惊叹的技术仍然需要训练有素的医务人员来操作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/AI-powered-tool-enhances-handheld-ultrasound-for-heart-imaging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/AI-powered-tool-enhances-handheld-ultrasound-for-heart-imaging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=614fd088-884d-4e94-9092-86f6e9edd687 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 13:47:59 -0400 AI-powered tool enhances handheld ultrasound for heart imaging
使用生物相容性铜基纳米材料进行图像引导癌症治疗宣布在《BIO Integration》杂志上发表一篇新文章。癌症是对人类健康构成重大威胁的重大疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Image-guided-cancer-treatment-using-bioknown-copper-based-nanomaterials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Image-guided-cancer-treatment-using-bioknown-copper-based-nanomaterials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ae9e2e1-54c3-41ac-aeda-916c109980cf Tue, 06 Aug 2024 13:18:00 -0400 Image-guided cancer treatment using biocompatible copper-based nanomaterials
